Player History
Injured on 6/10/1975 with a Stiff Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 8/16/1977, off Curtis Shifflett (TOL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/30/1978, off Paul Weiss (MAN)...
